column1: The data tracks retention and graduation outcomes for full-time, first-time students at CCSU from 2013–2023, broken down by school (Liberal Arts & Social Sciences, Business, Education, Engineering/Science/Technology, No School, and University total). It shows the size of each entering cohort, how many students were retained year-to-year, and the percentages completing their degrees within 4, 5, 6, or more years. This allows comparisons across academic divisions, highlighting differences in persistence and graduation patterns by school.
